description.0: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

0.0: Using an Elemental Burst grants a <cryo>12%</cryo> increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

1.0: Using an Elemental Burst grants a <cryo>15%</cryo> increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

2.0: Using an Elemental Burst grants a <cryo>18%</cryo> increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

3.0: Using an Elemental Burst grants a <cryo>21%</cryo> increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

4.0: Using an Elemental Burst grants a <cryo>24%</cryo> increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
